name: VaultReadFindReplace
friendlyName: Vault - Read KV secrets and replace in files.
description: This extension provide the ability to read KV secrets from HashiCorp Vault and find/replace in files.
author: PetronasDigital
instanceNameFormat: Vault - Read KV secrets and find/replace in files.

inputs.name: strUrl
inputs.label: Vault URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies the url of the Vault server (http or https).

inputs.name: ignoreCertificateChecks
inputs.label: Ignore certificate checks
inputs.helpMarkDown: Ignore errors from certificate checks.

inputs.name: strRequestTimeout
inputs.label: Request timeout
inputs.helpMarkDown: A number specifying the socket timeout in milliseconds. This will set the timeout before the socket is connected.

inputs.name: strAuthType
inputs.label: Authentication Method
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies the authentication method.

inputs.name: strAuthPath
inputs.label: Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Change default path of the chosen Authentication Method.
inputs.visibleRule: strAuthType = approle || strAuthType = azure || strAuthType = ldap || strAuthType = radius || strAuthType = azuremsi

inputs.name: strToken
inputs.label: Client Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Client Token for authentication.

inputs.name: strUsername
inputs.label: Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Username for authentication.
inputs.visibleRule: strAuthType = ldap || strAuthType = radius || strAuthType = userpass

inputs.name: strPassword
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Password for authentication.
inputs.visibleRule: strAuthType = ldap || strAuthType = radius || strAuthType = userpass

inputs.name: strRoleID
inputs.label: Role ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Role ID for AppRole authentication.

inputs.name: strSecretID
inputs.label: Secret ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Secret ID for AppRole authentication.

inputs.name: strRole
inputs.label: Role
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the role against which the login is being attempted.

inputs.name: strJWT
inputs.label: JWT
inputs.helpMarkDown: Signed JSON Web Token (JWT) from Azure MSI.

inputs.name: strSubscriptionID
inputs.label: Subscription ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: The subscription ID for the machine that generated the MSI token. This information can be obtained through instance metadata.

inputs.name: strResourceGroupName
inputs.label: Resource group name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The resource group for the machine that generated the MSI token. This information can be obtained through instance metadata.

inputs.name: strVmName
inputs.label: VM name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The virtual machine name for the machine that generated the MSI token. This information can be obtained through instance metadata. If 'VMSS name' is provided, this value is ignored.

inputs.name: strVmssName
inputs.label: VMSS name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The virtual machine scale set name for the machine that generated the MSI token. This information can be obtained through instance metadata.

inputs.name: strResourceURI
inputs.label: Resource URI
inputs.helpMarkDown: URI ID for Azure AD application.

inputs.name: strKVEnginePath
inputs.label: KV engine path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies the path of the KV engine.

inputs.name: kvVersion
inputs.label: KV version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies the version of the KV secrets engine.

inputs.name: strSecretPath
inputs.label: Secret path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies the path of the secrets to read. For a folder exploration add a '/' at the end of the path.

inputs.name: strPrefixType
inputs.label: Prefix type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies prefix type of the variables. Variables will be named PREFIX_VariableName.

inputs.name: strVariablePrefix
inputs.label: Variable prefix
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies prefix of the variables. Variables will be named PREFIX_VariableName.

inputs.name: replaceCR
inputs.label: Replace carriage return by a token
inputs.helpMarkDown: For secrets with multilines you have to replace the carriage return by a token because Azure Devops do not manage multiline secrets

inputs.name: strCRPrefix
inputs.label: Carriage return token
inputs.helpMarkDown: For secrets with multilines you have to replace the carriage return by a token because Azure Devops do not manage multiline secrets

inputs.name: strFilePath
inputs.label: Root Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Root configuration file for find/replace

inputs.name: strTargetFiles
inputs.label: Target files
inputs.helpMarkDown: List of target files for search/replace.
